text: Aur agar hum issay ajami zaban ka quran banatay to kehtay kay iss ki aayaten saaf saaf biyan kiyon nahi ki gayen? Yeh kiya kay ajami kitab aur aap arabi rasool? Aap keh dijiyey! Kay yeh to eman walon kay liye hidayat-o-shifa hai aur jo eman nahi latay unn kay kaano mein to (behra-pan aur) bojh hai aur yeh unn per andha-pan hai yeh woh log hain jo kissi boht door daraz jagah say pukaray jarahey hain
